title: Conquered Stages
subtitle: Boss battles won and stages cleared
noProjects: No stages found in this zone.

entries.title: JobStack 2.0
entries.description: Enterprise staffing battle platform for TrueBlue with microservices architecture, React micro-frontends, and AWS weapon integrations.
entries.longDescription: Led the assault on JobStack 2.0, a comprehensive staffing platform for TrueBlue. Built with .NET microservices and React micro-frontends, featuring Hangfire for background operations, Amazon Aurora (PostgreSQL) for data persistence, and extensive AWS weapon integrations including SNS, SQS, CloudFormation for infrastructure as code.

entries.title: TAP - Organizational Culture System
entries.description: SaaS battle platform to measure and analyze organizational culture, built from scratch as a guild co-founder.
entries.longDescription: Co-founded Grodivo guild and led the development of TAP, a system to measure organizational culture. Designed the entire battle architecture including .NET 9 microservices, React frontend with TypeScript and Styled Components, and AWS serverless fortress with Lambda, SNS, SQS, SES, and S3.
highlights: Built from scratch as guild co-founder

entries.title: Mining Traceability Apps
entries.description: Mobile battle apps for Peru's Ministry of Energy and Mines to track mineral transport with QR code generation and scanning.
entries.longDescription: Developed two .NET MAUI mobile battle applications to support Peru's informal-mining formalization campaign. The Transfer Registration app records mineral transport and generates QR codes, while the Enforcement app allows field operatives to scan and validate records against cloud databases.

entries.title: SJE - Electoral Management System
entries.description: Digital transformation campaign for JNE (National Electoral Jury) with electoral management and document archiving modules.
entries.longDescription: Senior operative on the SJE project as part of JNE's digital transformation campaign. Designed and deployed modules for electoral management, registration, candidates, authorities, and document archiving. Built a WinForms application for document scanning with barcode recognition integrated with FTP and cloud services.

entries.title: APOLO - Refinery Weighing Monitor
entries.description: Administration and monitoring system for refinery weighing equipment at Cajamarquilla (Nexa Resources).
entries.longDescription: Led development of APOLO, a comprehensive monitoring system for industrial weighing equipment at the Cajamarquilla refinery operated by Nexa Resources. The system provides real-time monitoring, administration, and reporting capabilities for critical weighing operations in the mining and refinery sector.

entries.title: PESACON TRUCK
entries.description: Multi-point truck weighing system with SAP data exchange, migrated from VB6 to modern .NET.
entries.longDescription: Developed PESACON TRUCK, a multi-point truck weighing system that integrates with SAP for real-time data exchange. The project involved migrating from legacy VB6 codebase to modern .NET Framework while maintaining integration with industrial weighing equipment through TCP and RS-232 protocols.
